location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 388 of 1852 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is responding to a communication from the Resident dated 30 June 1852 (No. 5), which reported the 'paucity of vessels in the Persian Gulf'. In response, it states that the Commander-in-Chief of the Indian Navy has been ordered to endeavour to strengthen the squadron during the season that 'slavers are expected', and to return the HC Schooner Constanceto the Gulf as soon as possible.
